replies.body: Their art is so amazing! Check out their Pixiv for more :) http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?mode=medium&illust_id=60142529

Very nice stuff.

This kinda inspired me to make a cyborg girl from the future that uses hard light weapons champion concept :)
That Lucian x Senna art is awsome
Senna looks a lot like Cortana

Is now my desktop background
They are dope, where can I find more?
http://lol.reactor.cc/ Is a flowless source, variable quality but new ones everyday !

Gonna be the wet blanket here and just put out the warning that there's a pretty fair amount of saucy and soft-core porn images if you follow that link. So if you're into that, jackpot, and if you're not then proceed at your own risk.
Don't worry guys. I'll, uh, validate this claim by looking at _every single picture_
Use a search engine like google or bing this is the artist name I beleive 穆也菌 (lingerftc) http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=1602884
Someone hire him?????
So Lucy is hanging out with Ghost Bride Morg now?
ty bump.
They're gone now; where can I find the lux one??? :-)
What do you mean? the link is still there and working.
I figured it out! The lux one was down for a couple of hours for some reason but is up again now :-)
Yeah his artwork is amazing! Using his PROJECT: Ashe art as my wallpaper right now. :D
